Package view

Class GraphicalCityMap

  • java.lang.Object
    • view.GraphicalCityMap
  • public class GraphicalCityMap
extends java.lang.Object
    This class groups all the graphical elements of the city map. It is used as the view of the CityMap of the model.
    Author:
    H4112

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      boolean addMode
      True if we are in add mode and should represent the selected intersections
      private DeliveryTour deliveryTour
      Delivery tour that we will have to print on the map.
      private GraphicalIntersection graphicalIntersection
      Graphical representation for the map of all the intersections.
      private GraphicalSegment graphicalSegment
      Graphical representation for the map of all the segments.
      Intersection i
      Clicked intersection
      private java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Long,​Intersection> listIntersection
      List of the intersections contained in the map.
      private RequestList requestList
      List of the requests corresponding to the map that will be highlighted on it if necessary.
